website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a solid set by a brand that is synonymous with quality, this is it.
pros: Top-quality craftsmanship in a 3-piece set that is also versatile, thanks to the 5 interchangeable tips that come with each tool
cons: The locks can be hard to maneuver when you change the tips, but once in place the tools won't disappoint

customer_reviews.title: High-end quality pro tools - pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just blown away by the quality! A bit cumbersome to use (like all retaining ring pliers) but these are super precise, very accurate and easy to control. Love the different tips that came with it but the case is a bit on the cheap side. Definitely practice a bit with these, like all the locking retaining pliers they take a bit of getting used to and make sure you use the right setting for the internal/external rings!!
customer_reviews.author: SmellsLikeScamSpirit

customer_reviews.title: Same as Lang part # 1465
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the CHANNELLOCK branded set of these. Lang Tools makes these under their name and many other toolmakers names. Automatic snap ring pliers. They can do internal and external snap rings. Comes with all necessary tip sizes for each pair of pliers. Case is well made. I figured better warranty and tip replacement if ever necessary by going with the reputable CHANNELLOCK branded set. Yes these are USA made too!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Simpson

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've been through several sets of snap ring pliers in my time. From kind with replaceable tips like these to the preformed type that you have to have several types of to complete a set. While I've never like replaceable tips in the past, I think it was because of the quality of them. These have been outstanding so far. No issues with the tips slipping out of place or twisting. Having the three different sizes helps as well to keep the most used setup ready to go at all times. Caught them on a good sale and highly recommend them to anyone looking for a set.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: USA made
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set. Made in the USA. Covers all your retaining ring needs. Flip of a switch to go from internal to external. Great price for a nice set. Each comes with its own set of pins.
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Great snap ring pliers
customer_reviews.text: Great snap ring pliers. It comes with a lot of different head attachments for each set of pliers. I was able to take some pretty huge snap rings off with the largest set after bending two others from other manufacturers. The little ones are great, precise and strong too. Really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: They do the job well
customer_reviews.text: They work as expected, no issues with items, the box is nice touch to keep track of the interchangeable tips. Quality is what you have come to expect from channellock
customer_reviews.author: Hillbilly62

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with cheap pliers slipping and bending on the larger rings. This set not only does not bend, the inserts are adjustable so that they can be tilted to prevent slipping out.
customer_reviews.author: handi1dan

customer_reviews.title: 3 Sizes & Tips
customer_reviews.text: Really like have a set of snap ring pliers now, that aren't totally cheap made. Some tips seem a little off alignment, hence no 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: BMF_VETERAN

customer_reviews.title: Best set of retaining ring pliers I have ever used ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to remove retaining clips from a TD04 turbocharger compressor housing and center cartridge. Best set of retaining ring pliers I have ever used BY FAR. Removed one star because the largest plier was stuck going from internal to external rings, but a little WD40 in the mechanism and some work managed to get it working smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: The right tool for the right job.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get out a 3 inch rusty snap ring with these and a rubber mallet.
customer_reviews.author: paratrooper4life

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with performance
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought these a long time ago. Perform well and enabled me to open all my ratchets for cleaning and lubrication. Got my 30 year old tools up and running. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: The versatility is nice for when it is needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I’m in the trade. I don’t know when or where l will need snap ring pliers. These go from internal to external by flipping a lever. The case is cool too. Each set comes with the tips and the wrench. Prepare the tool properly and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: kevin gong

customer_reviews.title: Great set little bulky but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great set must have Saved my ass Leverage spring is strong And love the reverse cam action
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wolak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set. The ratcheting lock on the largest plier ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. The ratcheting lock on the largest plier can be a little hard to disengage but very handy on large clips
customer_reviews.author: T. K. Eads

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice.
customer_reviews.text: I was considering just getting one, but I am glad I got the set, very happy with the products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the best you can get in my opinion. As always, Channellock delivers high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Spelbring

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great plier set. For home use, it will be all you need.
customer_reviews.author: propflux01

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this set I think is a must have
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work (maintenance at a factory) so I could keep my blue point set at my shop but I like these better. The only bad is the case there is no retention of the 2 smaller ones in their area.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: for its intended purpose. snap ring removal Best feature is the quality Made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for the price and time
customer_reviews.text: I like all the tools.I'm gong to be using everything for work.
customer_reviews.author: Brom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product/bad case. The tools don’t stay in the cutouts long enough to shut it
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great Just what I needed no more pinch fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! Just received it and took to work. Used it immediately on my arrival. Handles standard and metric
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: for the money theses are the best there are available wouldn't think twice if I needed them again just great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set and Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good set of retaining ring pliers. They are very solid and Channellock is my favorite brand for pliers and they're made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best work light I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Best work light I have ever had , excellent quality and unlike my old Craftsman's.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fowlds

customer_reviews.title: Do not bother
customer_reviews.text: product doesn't operate, sticks, and pinches fingers and hand. no instruction to release. Product fell apart while using.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanbenz

customer_reviews.title: this design is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this design of retaining ring pliers for over 30 years, sold under various names. I expect these to last just as long as the others. ( they grow legs very fast and find a new home quickly)
customer_reviews.author: sharptapp

product_meta.title: Channellock RT-3 Convertible Retaining Ring Plier Set, 3-Piece
product_meta.description: Solid construction and unmatched reliability. CHANNELLOCK Retaining Ring pliers have the kind of accuracy and engineering that'll keep them in your toolbox for years to come.
feature_bullets: Change from internal to external rings with a simple switch of the tab
Includes 5 pairs of color coded interchangeable tips
